title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.45 - Bookmakers barred
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.45 - Bookmakers barred

State Regulations

All persons found making book on the races at any
track shall be barred by the track operator from the grounds of the race track
for not less than the duration of the meeting, and a memorandum of the matter
forthwith transmitted to the commission and to the district attorney of the
county in which the offense has been committed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4003.45

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
